content: free chart for when you have the winter blues about all of the ice on the ground in the us chart can be used to create a tapestry or for color work on another piece i used dk yarn and a 4 mm hook but you can use the chart with any yarn weight and corresponding hook for a different look/size pattern is for 32 row of 40 stitches i started with fsc of 40 for the first row and then did single_crochet with mostly floats for the rest of the row bottom-up i alternated between regular row of single_crochet and backwards row of single_crochet so the right side was always facing forward please feel free to make this pattern and spread the message pattern is free to use and distribute but please don t copy without credit feel free to send the pdf to others and to tag me in your makes
